description_txt: stated on October 7, 2008 in a debate in Nashville, Tenn.:

description_txt: stated on September 15, 2008 in a television ad:

description_txt: stated on September 1, 2008 in a TV ad:

description_txt: stated on October 7, 2008 in Nashville, Tenn.:

description_txt: stated on October 7, 2008 in a debate in Nashville, Tenn.:

description_txt: stated on October 7, 2008 in a debate in Nashville, Tenn.:

description_txt: stated on October 7, 2008 in a debate in Nashville, Tenn.:

quote_txt: "1.3-million people in America make their living off eBay."

description_txt: stated on October 7, 2008 in comment from McCain spokesman Tucker Bounds on Fox News:

description_txt: stated on October 7, 2008 in a debate in Nashville, Tenn.:

description_txt: stated on October 7, 2008 in a debate in Nashville, Tenn.:
quote_txt: "I have disagreed strongly with the Bush administration on this issue" of global warming.

description_txt: stated on October 6, 2008 in Clearwater, Fla.:

description_txt: stated on October 6, 2008 in a Web site:

description_txt: stated on October 3, 2008 in in a television ad:

description_txt: stated on October 2, 2008 in a debate in St. Louis:

description_txt: stated on October 2, 2008 in St. Louis:

description_txt: stated on October 2, 2008 in St. Louis:
